plot: Follows an elderly flamenco dancer in Tel Aviv who, after the death of his wife, falls for another dancer in his troupe. After she rejects him he continues his quest to find another mate. Also examines the love lives of the other dancers.
title: Harikud Shel Alfonso
plot_es: Follows an elderly flamenco dancer in Tel Aviv who, after the death of his wife, falls for another dancer in his troupe. After she rejects him he continues his quest to find another mate. Also examines the love lives of the other dancers.
plot_en: Follows an elderly flamenco dancer in Tel Aviv who, after the death of his wife, falls for another dancer in his troupe. After she rejects him he continues his quest to find another mate. Also examines the love lives of the other dancers.
